message.body: Hey uncle danny, its #####.. what is your moms address again?
Ok... this morning I had the police academy fitness exam. I passed!!
As if there was any doubt
You scare me with all that police jazz

Ahaha.. that's what everyone is saying but ill be fine. I also had an interview for probation officer last month. Still waiting to hear back, a judge makes the final decision. So I have two options now
My best advice is Trust no one. The police dept is one big soap opera
Cover your own ###. Don't believe anyone
